queries.text: Have any offences been compounded by the company? If yes, provide the following details: (a) what is the offence that has been compounded? (i.e., mention 'particulars of offence' and 'name of act and section under which offence committed'); (b) 'name of court/concerned authority' before which the offence has been compounded?; and (c) what is the 'amount of compounding'?
